title: The Human Act and Other Stories
description: The Human Act and Other Stories features a cast of diverse characters struggling to reconcile the lives they want with the lives they have been given. From the teenage girl trying to escape poverty in “Ashes to Angels” to the new mother mourning the loss of her abandoned career in “Queen of Jingle Junk” to the young man searching for meaning in “Hope in the Laundry Room,” readers discover the courage to transcend circumstances and embrace their complicated lives with humor and grace.
author: Angela Lam
